page.title: 19The McKenzie Family
page.content: Every morning my dad gets up first.At 5.30 he collects the dog, goes to the field and brings in the cows to the parlour for milking.I get up at 7.30 and my mum and sister get up at 8.00. We all make our own breakfast.I usually have tea and toast. My sister goes to Lockerbie Academy and I go to Johnstonebridge School.Dad usually finishes the milking about 7.15, then he has his breakfast. My mum does the hoovering and makes the beds until 10.00 when she makes a cup of coffee for everyone.Then she has to make the dinner for my dad and his two workers. I have mine at school. The two workers go home at 5.30 and we have our supper. Then we might watch tv or play bowls in the winter and golf in summer.
